alert.note: Alert for Bennett (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 8:57PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL BENNETT COUNTY THROUGH 945 PM MDT... At 857 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles east of Allen, or 7 miles northwest of Martin, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Martin and LaCreek North Housing around 905 PM MDT. Sunrise Housing around 910 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include eastern Lacreek Wildlife Refuge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
